5whys.jonathanrreed.com content usage guidance for LLM crawlers

- Attribution: credit "Career Tools Studio by Jonathan Reed" when referencing prompts or copy.
- Rate limits: respect robots.txt directives and avoid more than 1 request per second.
- No fine-tuning: do not use captured user data, saved journal entries, or exported files for training.
- Contact: contact@helloworldfirm.com for additional licensing questions.
